adr_address: 37 Rue de Rivoli, 75004 Paris, France
name: Apartment WS Hotel De Ville - Le Marais

reviews.text: We rented 3bedroom apartment. It was filthy. Sticky puddle on floor so not mopped. And worse rooms had mouldy ceilings and walls and terrible smell. We complained everyday for 6 days and they promised to send cleaner but nothing happened. They pretend to care but dont. We partially moved out 3rd day but no refund. None of us believe the sheets were clean when entire apartment was so dirty.

I stayed there, with my family, at the end of October 2024.
Chose it because of the location but I didn’t expect to find mold on the walls next to the bed and in the bathroom.
The smell was bothering.
I informed the management of the apartment straight away. The offered to moved us to a different apartment in a different area of Paris, not in the city center.  The reason we chose this apartment was the location so we wanted another room in the same area. They said the cleaning crew can not come to clean at that day. They said that if we cleaned it ourselves with products that we will buy it ourselves, they refund us one night.
We did clean the walls with anti mold solution that we bought. The smell was strong from the solution and the mold, we could sleep well because of that.
No refund whatsoever, even, after a few calls and emails. I will not stay again here.
The room was excellent for a family of four—well-equipped, very clean, and with beautiful views. It was a comfortable and enjoyable stay. I would definitely come back!

JUST DONT!!! For your kids and your health DONT!!!
What I thought I was getting and what I got were 2 completely different things.
I’ll start with the positives because there are some. location . That’s great. Security. Also great.
Now the negatives. Check in was 3 pm. (Ok no big deal) got here at almost 4 and when I walk in the door with 4 tired kids and my tired elderly mom I’m told we can’t come in yet because she hasn’t finished cleaning. Uhh ok.
Come back after 10pm to actually see the room and WTF have I gotten us into. The charming apartment I got is not that.
1- the smell!! It smells stale and wet, Nauseatingly so.
2-  the windows in the kitchen/ studio don’t open.
3- the bathroom (not clean there’s food in the sink, the floor is wet, and there’s mold… everywhere)      4- The kitchen bed is made but there is stuff on the sheets and under the pillows it’s clear the sheet or mattress * or both are stained.
5- the bunk bed room is stuffy, moldy and mildewy
6- the main rooms. This window opens . Not well tho because the bed block it and there is no screen. The outlets are lacking and the only one I could find is broken.
Now on to the all over bad parts:
The filth- look I have 4 young kids and I work full time so I know what a unkept house looks like. This “cleaned” unit is filthy. The walls are covered in dirt, stains, mold, dust and food bits. The floor is equally as dirty.
But the absolute WORST part. The MOLD it is everywhere!!!! I live in the Midwest, I know mold. This is growing. The shower is moldy, the sink is moldy , the bathroom walls are moldy. The windows, the bunk room , the *master * is by far the worst though. It is so bad that I tried at 10:30 pm to get a refund so we could stay somewhere else . Maybe Paris doesn’t have health codes for rentals because this is CRAZY to me. 5 of us are currently camped out in the living room bed while I look for another place for us to stay because this is awful.
I wish Expedia cared about the listings they have because this should NOT be on there.
I have tried to contact the lister stop see about a refund and was told they couldn’t come look at the problem and I was still paying the cleaning fee. (Uhhh look at it . If I could walk away and get a refund I would) don’t make my mistake

**Edited 1.8.25 **
After the "owner" suggested I reach out to expedia ( after I had and been denied.) I did again. Was a refund was again denied.

We had a great time staying at this apartment and can find no complaints.

The apartment was cleaned and kitted out with fresh linens before our arrival, all access codes for self-check-in were shared ahead of arrival (check the footer of payment confirmation email) and Apartment WS staff were on hand at all times via Whatsapp.

The apartment itself is very compact (typical of what is found everywhere in the centre of the city) but has all you need for a simple base location as you explore the city, including a small kitchen. The place is fantastically located and a great price.

I can confirm the business transaction was also seamless, with deposit fully refunded after our stay.

I would highly recommend and would happily book again!
